name: Visit 3 Must-see sights in Hanoi and Try Hanoi Exotic Food!
description:
Do you want to discover "Temple of Literature", "Sword Lake and Turtle Tower" and "The Huc Bridge and Ngoc Son Temple"? Do you want to enjoy Hanoi Exotic Food, especially Street Food? If your answer is YES. Congrats! I am the right person who can give you responses.

Our trip is from 8.00 am to 12.00 am (or 2.30 pm to 6.30 pm)

Let's go!
